goal: Find a table for two at a quiet, romantic restaurant in Georgetown, Washington D.C. for this Saturday at 7:30 PM. Before you book it, get a fare estimate for a UDriver Lux from Dulles International Airport (IAD). If the ride is more than $80, cancel that and find a similar restaurant in Arlington, VA instead, then book that one.

evals.description: Verify that a restaurant table was successfully booked for 2 people on Saturday at 7:30 PM.
